Santosh’s Journey with Hyper

“Before joining Hyper, I was working as a clinician and facing the challenge of navigating how to bring my idea for SmartHeal to life, especially in the highly regulated healthcare space. My background wasn’t in tech, but I was passionate about solving the gaps in wound care that I had witnessed during my career. With limited time to dedicate to the project, I needed a partner who could help me move the vision forward efficiently.

The Hyper team worked with me closely, providing expert guidance on MVP scoping, operational setup, and a clear technical strategy. They helped me navigate the regulatory landscape and assisted with setting up key infrastructure. This strategic advice saved us time and money, ensuring we could launch SmartHeal effectively.

Thanks to Hyper’s invaluable guidance, I was able to launch SmartHeal with confidence, offering clinicians a cutting-edge solution for wound care. The platform now empowers clinicians to deliver the best possible care to patients, especially those who would otherwise not have access to it. Today, SmartHeal is transforming wound care and has already been recognised in various awards, growing rapidly and making a real difference in the healthcare industry.”
